title: Science Learning Design and Assessment Utilizing Infographics

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science concepts and basic proficiency in digital tools
context.additional_context: Science content-centered design linked to work tasks for working adult learners, utilizing collaborative tools in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can visually represent scientific concepts using infographic creation tools
Learners can collaboratively complete science-themed infographic projects with peers
Learners are assessed on their ability to effectively communicate complex scientific information through infographics
Learners can determine the educational effectiveness of infographics by analyzing survey results
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
